description: This guide on how to cook dried chickpeas will teach you everything you need to know! It has all the info for preparing, soaking and cooking so you'll have ready to use beans for all your meals.
keywords: cooking dried beans, how to cook beans
name: How to Cook Dried Chickpeas
recipeIngredient: water (, or broth if preferred (see method for amount)

recipeInstructions.text: Soak chickpeas overnight, or for 6-8 hours.

If using the quick soak method, put chickpeas into a saucepan and cover with 2 inches of water. Bring to a boil and allow to cook for about 5 minutes, then remove from heat and cover. Let stand for one hour!
Once soaked, put chickpeas in a pot and cover with water, about 3 inches above the beans.
Bring to a boil, then lower to a simmer and cook for about 30-60 minutes, checking every 15 minutes for desired tenderness.
